description: The Stari Grad Plain is located on the island of Hvar in the Adriatic Sea. This cultural landscape is recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site due, in part, to its pristine state of preservation, which dates back to the time of Greek colonization by Paros in the fourth century BCE.
